title: Shanghai Oriental Sports Center
description: The Shanghai Oriental Sports Center.
description-cn: 海东方体育中心。
data: Nikon D90 | f/25 | 2.5 sec | ISO 100 | 24 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Orangutan
description: International animals conforming to Canadian culture.
description-cn: 国际动物应符合加拿大文化。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5.6 | 1/80 sec | ISO 1250 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Shanghai Oriental Sports Center
description: The Shanghai Oriental Sports Center. Its lights alternate between blue and red; take a photo during the transition and you get purple!
description-cn: 上海东方体育中心。 它的灯有时变蓝有时变红；在换的时间时拍一把照的话，就出现紫色！
data: Nikon D90 | f/20 | 30 sec | ISO 100 | 26 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: The Bund
description: Rushing waves, flowing waves Thousand miles of the torrential river flows ceaselessly forever Washed away the worldly affairs Torrential mixing of the tidal currents.
description-cn: 浪奔，浪流，萬里滔滔江水永不休，淘盡了，世間事，混作滔滔一片潮流
data: Nikon D90 | f/11 | 2.5 sec | ISO 500 | 18 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Wu Jiao Chang
description: Wu Jiao Chang (an intersection of five roads).
description-cn: 五角场。
data: Nikon D90 | f/7.1 | 30 sec | ISO 200 | 18 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Painting of the Past
description: Painting a dream from memory. The leaves flow like brush strokes; the building shifting and hazy. Don't you see the flakes of paint flying like sparks?
description-cn: 闭上眼睛怀念上海时，这就是我想象的景色。这张更像一幅画，一丝一丝笔触的柳叶， impressionist trees，smudged skies，scuffed paint. 就像是水上摸不到的倒影。 燃烧的回忆，短暂带来的温暖，多美妙啊！我希望我未来能继续走向这个方向。 我觉得要好好学拍照，就需要先从画家那里学。我对flashy的照片没兴趣。 艺术的意义是使人表出和分享自己心里说不出口的感情。 这就是：life seen through my viewfinder.
data: Nikon D90 | f/7 | 1/50 sec | ISO 640 | 35 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Aged Memory
description: The neighbourhood park where I lived in Shanghai; aged and weathered, not so different from my grandparents. This is but a faded and yellowing memory
description-cn: 我回国时会住在我阿公阿婆家。照片里的小公园就在楼房外。 池塘旁边有两个水泥蘑菇。在童年时，阿公会陪着我在那儿抓蝌蚪，钓虾。 唉，那时，水比现在清多了。一丝一丝的回忆浮到水面，慢慢跟着河流飘散。 亭子的漆掉了也没人维修。公园里的乐色没人捡。现在也没有小孩在这儿玩儿耍了。 唉，老人家也上岁数了。我也长大了。童年的回忆现在只是一张，褪色，发黄的照片而已。 但不管这里变得多么破烂，对我还是世界上最美丽的几个地方之一。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5.6 | 1/60 sec | ISO 640 | 35 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Chilling at DC
description: Chilling at DC after exams.
description-cn: 期中考试后在滑铁卢DC。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5.6 | 1/160 sec | ISO 800 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Cafe Europa
description: Cafe Europa (Customer Entrance Only).
description-cn: 欧罗巴咖啡厅（客户特定入口）。
data: Nikon D90 | f/11 | 1/320 sec | ISO 800 | 48 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Construction Worker
description: What a long day it must have been. I imagine him tired but satisfied; eudaimonistic. And yeah, I went crazy on the edits with this one.
description-cn: 这可能是我最喜欢的照片，应为有点像我爱的画家 - Caspar David Friedrich。 单独一个人，站在一个旷阔的背景前，但是一点都没有孤独的感觉，而有点伟大。
data: Nikon D90 | f/9 | 1/3200 sec | ISO 500 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Blue Heron
description: Blue Heron amidst turbulent skies.
description-cn: 在丝绸云彩中飞舞的大蓝鹭。
data: Nikon D90 | f/36 | 4/5 sec | ISO 200 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

description: Meet me in DC at 6.
data: Nikon D90 | f/5.6 | 1/160 sec | ISO 800 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Construction Workers
description: Construction workers at the Shanghai Oriental Sports Center.
description-cn: 上海东方体育中心上的建筑工人们。
data: Nikon D90 | f/9 | 1/1000 sec | ISO 500 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Waterfall
description: I'm quite pleased with this one, as it imitates the impressionist paintings of old.
description-cn: 我特别喜欢这张照片因为它有点像一幅impressionist画。重点不是记录景色，而是表出奔腾的瀑布的流动和力量。
data: GoPro Hero5 Black | f/2.8 | 1/3000 sec | ISO 100 | 3 mm (5.6x crop body)

title: California Dreamin'
description: Self portrait at the DC tunnel.
description-cn: DC天桥的自拍。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5 | 1/200 sec | ISO 800 | 52 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Construction Worker
description: Sometimes we are insignificant to our creations, and that's awesome.
description-cn: 有时跟我们的创作相比，我们真的好微小; 这样多伟大啊。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5.6 | 1/1000 sec | ISO 500 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Love Lock Bridge
description: Romantics who neither find love nor death, become Byronic.
description-cn: 永远有多久？无尽无底？一辈子？人的青年？还是只是夏天的一个夜晚？ 或许我这个老古董已经过期了，但是我还觉得永远就是永远。 我不知，咸泪会不会使铁锁生锈，弹簧掉出，永远卡在这儿， 慢慢崩坏，散开？无论“永远”这两个字带来多少痛苦， 真心的承诺值得坚持下去。永远真正有多久，我们只能 wait and see.
data: Nikon D90 | f/5.6 | 1/160 sec | ISO 200 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Wai Bai Du Bridge
description: Wai Bai Du Bridge. Fun fact, it's the first all-steel bridge in China.
description-cn: 外白渡桥。 有趣的事实：这是中国第一座全钢铁桥。
data: Nikon D90 | f/13 | 2.5 sec | ISO 500 | 21 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Parisian Christmas
description: Parisian Christmas (Parisian as in Paris, Ontario).
title-cn: 巴黎的圣诞节 （安大略的巴黎）
description-cn: 巴黎的圣诞节
data: Nikon D90 | f/10 | 1/2500 sec | ISO 800 | 58 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Hay Bale
description: I was biking down Highway 48 when I greeted a couple of young photographers taking photos of haybales. An hour later, I returned with my own camera.
description-cn: 我骑下乡间公路时，我看见一两个年轻摄影师在路边拍照片。一小时后，我带好自己的照相机回到原地。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5.6 | 2 sec | ISO 1000 | 85 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Shanghai Pearl Ring
description: Shanghai Pearl Ring (changing focal lengths during a long exposure is fun).
description-cn: 陆家嘴 (长曝光时改焦距好好玩儿)。
data: Nikon D90 | f/16 | 30 sec | ISO 500 | 18 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Super Brand Mall
description: Super Brand Mall.
description-cn: 正大广场。
data: Nikon D90 | f/11 | 1/100 sec | ISO 500 | 18 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Monument to the People's Heroes
description: The ferries of the Yangtze illuminating the Monument to the People's Heroes.
description-cn: 长江的渡轮照亮的人民英雄纪念塔。
data: Nikon D90 | f/11 | 30 sec | ISO 500 | 52 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Shanghai Alley
description: An alley I discovered while wandering the streets of Shanghai. It's shocking how quickly the city develops.
description-cn: 在上海逛街时找到的胡同。每次回国时都会对上海发展的速度感到惊讶。

title: Cyclist
description: Cyclist below the Gardiner Expressway. I think this photograph properly captures the awkwardness I put him in. Oops.
description-cn: 公路下的骑自行车者。他满脸尴尬是不是因为我？Oops。
data: Nikon D90 | f/8 | f/160 sec | ISO 200 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Kensington Monster
description: A little monster I found prowling the rooftops. To create the off-putting blending, I abused noise removal.
description-cn: 屋顶上的小魔鬼。来创出这种特效，我反复用了去噪，把照片模糊了。
data: Nikon D90 | f/7.1 | 1/1000 sec | ISO 200 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Yu Yuan Caretaker
description: Yu Yuan Garden Caretaker.
description-cn: 豫园清洁工。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5.6 | 1/1000 sec | ISO 800 | 66 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Market Steed
description: A noble steed, rearing its legs atop a mountain.
description-cn: 山上的雄伟的战马。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5 | 1/320 sec | ISO 200 | 34 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Starry Lights
description: Toy seller illuminating the darkness.
description-cn: 玩具卖家照耀黑夜。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5.6 | 1/60 sec | ISO 2000 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Bird
description: Not gonna lie, birds are amazing models to work with. They ask no questions.
description-cn: 老实说，鸟当模特还干的相当好。它们不问问题。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5.6 | 1/60 sec | ISO 400 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Flowing Water
description: It reminds me of the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics Logo; brushstrokes on glassy water.
description-cn: Together for a Shared Future, 一起向未来！ 这个水流很想北京2022冬奥的标识。
data: Nikon D90 | f/36 | 2 sec | ISO 400 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Submerged Rock
description: A submerged formation of sedimentary rock.
description-cn: 淹没的石头。
data: GoPro Hero5 Black | f/2.8 | 1/440 sec | ISO 100 | 3 mm (5.6x crop body)

title: Honest Weight
description: I wonder what they sell on Paris' Main Street? Honest Weight (Made in Canada).
description-cn: 看看巴黎主街的商店都买什么？Honest Weight (Made in Canada)。
data: Nikon D90 | f/11 | 1/320 sec | ISO 800 | 40 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: 1933 Slaughterhouse
description: 1933 Slaughterhouse. It took me forever to find this place; I couldn't read the (incorrect) destination I inputted in Chinese.
description-cn: 1933老场坊。 我这个傻文盲, 用百度地图瞎选了第一个选项。没想到是错的 XD。最后走来走去，走了猴年马月才找到。
data: Nikon D90 | f/10 | 1/200 sec | ISO 200 | 18 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: The Expo Axis
description: The Expo Axis. Amusingly, when I was eating lunch beneath the glass structure, a man came to me advertising an English class. Alas, he should have offered grade one Chinese XD.
description-cn: 世博轴。 我在塔下吃中饭时,一个帅哥问我对他的英文补习班。可惜啊，他应该推荐一个小学一年级汉语班 XD。
data: Nikon D90 | f/9 | 1/800 sec | ISO 500 | 50 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: China Art Museum
description: China Art Museum. Wonky aspect ratio, I know.
description-cn: 中华艺术宫。 这个照片放在最后应为它的纵横比怪怪的。
data: Nikon D90 | f/11 | 1/100 sec | ISO 500 | 18 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Fireworks
description: In this, I see an eye gazing towards the heavens.
description-cn: 我看到一只向天空看往的眼睛。
data: Nikon D90 | f/11 | 6 sec | ISO 200 | 28 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Ivory Combs
description: Ivory Combs.
description-cn: 象牙梳。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5.6 | 1/500 sec | ISO 800 | 50 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Pearson Airport
description: Baggage carts at Toronto Pearson Airport. Rain makes colours contrast more. So does Photoshop.
description-cn: 多伦多皮尔逊机场的行李车。 雨使颜色对比更加强烈。 Photoshop 也是如此。
data: Nikon D90 | f/6.3 | 1/320 sec | ISO 500 | 62 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Blue Mountain
description: Blue Mountain. I swear the snowbanks were taller when I was young. Or maybe I was just really short.
description-cn: 蓝山。 我真么记得小时候时，雪堆好高啊。。。也可能我那时就是很矮。
data: Nikon D90 | f/14 | 1/400 sec | ISO 500 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Just Chilling
description: I was taking a portrait (of a cyclist), when the guy asked for my photo. I had originally ignored earlier, but since he insisted, I took his photo. He didn't want anyone else in it though. Oops.
description-cn: 我拍路过的骑自行车人时，他突然问我能不能给他拍张照。 本来我没理他，但因为被他强迫，我最终拍了一张。他不想让另些人陪他在照片里。。。oops。
data: Nikon D90 | f/8 | 1/160 sec | ISO 200 | 52 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Road to Distant Lands
description: Is this not the path we chose?
description-cn: 这不就是我们理想中的道路吗？
data: Nikon D90 | f/18 | 1/320 sec | ISO 200 | 34 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: FengHuang
description: Fenghuang gazing upon Shanghai.
description-cn: 看望上海的凤凰。
data: Nikon D90 | f/9 | 1/4000 sec | ISO 800 | 85 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Yu Yuan Cat
description: Clearly the cat was the main attraction at the Yu Yuan Garden. Note that I am not affiliated with the young girl. Or the cat.
description-cn: 豫园没拍成功，但是看起来像人都对这只猫有不少兴趣。肯能它就是主要景点。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5.6 | 1/500 sec | ISO 800 | 85 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Bumble Bee
description: Bumble bee on a flower. I took this photo at the Royal Botanical Gardens way back when I was starting out in photography.
description-cn: 花朵上的小熊蜂。这张照片是我刚开始摄影时拍的。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5.6 | 1/60 sec | ISO 400 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: The Denizens' Capes
description: The denizens' capes fluttering in the warm summer breeze. They belong to a humble bunch who earnestly and diligently toil to uphold the foundations of society. Thusly, it is their modest tower that stands tallest and proudest amongst a skyline of glistening skyscrapers; as they are the pillar of Shanghai.
description-cn: 老百姓们的披风在夏日的微风摇曳。 它们属于一群谦逊的人们，那些天天在背景里勤奋地维护和维修社会正常运行的人。 无论岗位多么渺小，他们都是社会中不可或缺的人们。 所以他们普白的高塔在照片里矗立得最高，他们的身影有那么高耸，那么雄伟壮观。 这就是定(上)海神针。
data: Nikon D90 | f/9 | 1/640 sec | ISO 200 | 42 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Lights
description: Another fun photo born from the limitations of photographing in a classroom.
description-cn: 这又是一张在教室里拍的照片。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5.6 | 1/80 sec | ISO 1250 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Trees
description: Trees.
description-cn: 树林。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5 | 1/80 sec | ISO 800 | 18 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Pedal to the Metal
description: A bike chain shaped bike rack.
description-cn: 一个自行车链子模型的锁车架。
data: Nikon D90 | f/11 | 1/250 sec | ISO 200 | 75 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Beer Bottle
description: This one was from my photography club. I brought in some props and some Chistmas lights, and we all had some fun. Someone decided to flip the bottle (still filled with water) over, and that's how I got this photo.
description-cn: 这是在我组织的摄影俱乐部拍的。我带了一些圣诞节灯，来让人练习练习。 一个小伙子把啤酒瓶翻身了一下（里面还满满这水），这就是这个照片的来源。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5.6 | 1/30 sec | ISO 1000 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Shanghai World Expo Museum
description: Shanghai World Expo Museum. It is a shame I had only a small second to take this one.
description-cn: 世博会博物馆。可惜这个照片拍的有点急忙忙的。
data: Nikon D90 | f/7.1 | 1/500 sec | ISO 500 | 25 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Waterfall
description: A churning, frothy waterfall. I think I finally found a use for my GoPro XD.
description-cn: 奔腾的瀑布，惊涛澎湃，冲向前方。我终于给我的GoPro找出用处了。
data: GoPro Hero5 Black | f/2.8 | 1/1300 sec | ISO 100 | 3 mm (5.6x crop body)

title: Fireworks
description: Fireworks! Looks like lightning (probably because I bumped into the tripod).
description-cn: 焰火! 看起来像闪电 (我可能碰到三脚架的了)。
data: Nikon D90 | f/9 | 8 sec | ISO 200 | 30 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: UofT Bike Rack
description: Forgive me, Mr. Goose.
description-cn: 求鹅先生绕我。
data: Nikon D90 | f/11 | 1/250 sec | ISO 200 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Waterfall
description: Wow I am indecisive with these; one more waterfall photo for y'all.
description-cn: 唉，我真优柔寡断。给你们再发一张瀑布的照片。
data: GoPro Hero5 Black | f/2.8 | 1/2500 sec | ISO 100 | 3 mm (5.6x crop body)

title: Xin Tian Di Alley
description: A narrow alley in Xin Tian Di (新天地); a district of reconstituted traditional mid-19th century Shanghainese houses (石库门).
description-cn: 新天地的石库门。

title: Another Bird
description: I told you, birds make excellent models. They're far more cooperative than humans. Quite a bit more patient too.
description-cn: 我说对了吧，小鸟很配合我也有耐心，跟人比起来优秀多了。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5.6 | 1/60 sec | ISO 400 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Old Bicycle
description: My loyal steed, braving the lawless back alleys of Shanghai.
description-cn: 我忠诚的骏马，勇敢的陪我探险上海的胡同。
data: Nikon D90 | f/1.8 | 1/1000 sec | ISO 800 | 35 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Worker's Houses
description: Temporary housing for construction workers.
description-cn: 建筑工人的临时房屋。
data: Nikon D90 | f/9 | 1/640 sec | ISO 500 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Shanghai World Expo Museum
description: Shanghai World Expo Museum. I didn't get much time to take photos there, but I'll one day return to this crystal edifice.
description-cn: 上海世博会博物馆。 可惜我没呆在那儿太长，一天一定要回去好好拍拍照。

title: Break Time
description: Break Time.
description-cn: 休息时间。
data: Nikon D90 | f/8 | 1/640 sec | ISO 200 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Gardiner Expressway
description: The Gardiner Expressway; geometric mess of concrete and rust.
description-cn: 锈碎的水泥镜框。
data: Nikon D90 | f/10 | 1/500 sec | ISO 200 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Skyline
description: An empty bit of skyline.
description-cn: 外滩附近的天际线。
data: Nikon D90 | f/13 | 1/640 sec | ISO 500 | 34 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Silver (With Attitude)
description: There's that awkward moment where you want to ask for their consent but they're trying to ignore you XD.
description-cn: 好尴尬呀，我想问可不可以拍他们的照片，但老板装我不存在 XD。
data: Nikon D90 | f/7.1 | 1/250 sec | ISO 200 | 35 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Dilapidated Motel
description: Niagara sucks; not only has one of nature's crown jewels been defifiled, the imprints of man are dilapidated and rotten; the lowest of lows.
description-cn: 唉，尼亚加拉真难看，每秒自然风景之一，尼亚加拉大瀑布被人类最低级最 粗鲁的创物侮辱了。真可悲。
data: Nikon D90 | f/13 | 1/125 sec | ISO 200 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Fish Feeding
description: Feeding fish; what a popular girl she is.
description-cn: 喂鱼; 哇这个女孩儿多么受欢迎。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5 | 1/400 sec | ISO 800 | 58 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Scaffolding
description: The outershell, the framework, for something new to come.
description-cn: 外壳，框架，支撑未来所有的创建。
data: Nikon D90 | f/7.1 | 1/1000 sec | ISO 200 | 48 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Industrial Complex
description: An industrial complex.
description-cn: 一个工业园区（不太清楚）。

title: Construction Site
description: Under construction or abandoned?
description-cn: 正在建造还是已经被抛弃了呢？

title: Shanghai Skyscrapers
description: Shanghai Tower. It's kind of awesome how all three skyscrapers are in this photo.
description-cn: 上海中心大厦。这一张照片拍到上海三个最大的高楼大厦
data: Nikon D90 | f/13 | 1/100 sec | ISO 500 | 18 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Mirrored Reflections
description: Glassy reflections patterned by a skyscraper.
description-cn: 高楼的多多反射。
data: Nikon D90 | f/10 | 1/125 sec | ISO 200 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Reflection of Shanghai Tower
description: Reflection of the Shanghai Tower; it's like a stained glass mosaic.
description-cn: 上海中心大厦的倒影；就像一个彩色玻璃马赛克。

title: Toronto Skyline
description: Toronto skyline seen from Tommy Thompson Park.
description-cn: 多伦多的夜间天际线。
data: Nikon D90 | f/36 | 10 sec | ISO 200 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Bird
description: See, the bird is a nice subject. It's a shame my camera bugged out, and failed to capture much colour.
description-cn: 看，就像我说的，鸟当模特还真不错。可惜我照相机突然有了故障，颜色少了不少。
data: Nikon D90 | f/5.6 | 1/60 sec | ISO 800 | 105 mm (1.5x crop body)

title: Behind the Falls
description: A cave behind the Niagara Falls.
